pageContent: Background: There is little information available on health-related quality of life in patients with chemotherapy-naïve metastatic castration-resistant prostate cancer. This study aimed to develop a conceptual model that describes patients' experiences of living with this condition.

metaData.source:
Facing life-prolonging treatment: The perspectives of men with advanced metastatic prostate cancer - An interview study
https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/33126157/
